str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Over, on the other side, beyond. Apparently accusative case of an obsolete derivative of peiro; through, i.e. Across.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To loose, release; I solve, settle, explain, interpret, decide. From epi and luo; to solve further, i.e. to explain, decide.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) legal, statutory, duly constituted, (b) under the law, obedient to the law. From en and nomos; legal, or subject to.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
